title: CampMate
summary: A full-stack camping and outdoor trip planner featuring intelligent packing checklist generation based on real-time weather forecasts, interactive campsite exploration with Leaflet maps, and secure JWT-based authentication. Built with a monorepo architecture and automated AWS ECS Fargate deployment.

title: Smart-Fit
summary: An AI-integrated fitness application featuring personalized health insights powered by OpenAI's GPT-4. Includes a data-driven visualization suite built with Chart.js for tracking workout progress and a responsive dashboard for comprehensive health management.

title: Semantic Code Architecture
summary: A context-aware coding agent utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Model Context Protocol (MCP) to analyze and debug complex software architectures. Developed as a capstone project to improve semantic understanding of code structures.

title: LingoBear
summary: An AI-powered audio processing application that transcribes recorded voice into text and provides seamless multi-language translation. It leverages Hugging Face Transformers, specifically the Whisper model for speech-to-text and MarianMT for translation, all running within a fast, lightweight React interface.

title: Information-Theoretic Analysis of Parliamentary Debates
summary: A computational social science research project quantifying polarization in Australian parliamentary immigration debates (2010-2025). Utilized Mutual Information and Information Theory metrics to analyze framing dynamics and identify political agenda-setters.

title: Debugger MCP
summary: DAP MVP with debugpy + MCP host.
